Mk1

Mk2

RollKageMk2 Testpack KSP 0.23 22/12/13

We added some nice new wheels...and we liked the engne look of the rtgs

So we added a little engine

That you can make into a big engine

(shhh... its actually a RTG for now)

Enjoy!

updated 21/06/2013

A simple rover building system.

Pack Includes:

Mk1-EF RollKage

RollKage Universal Extender

and 3 types of advanced Kerchelin wheels

Engine style RTG

The RollKage and extender parts come in 6 colours, To remove any colours you don't want permanently , simply delete the corresponding named cfg files inside the part folder.

(usually the cfg file is called 'part.cfg' but in this case it will be named red.cfg, yellow.cfg, etc)

WIP and stuff we are talking about adding:

tidy up the cfgs on the structural parts, make the parts weigh more

add a battery

add headlights

add an engine or generator (added)

add more wheels (added 1 set total 3)

add a pickup truck style piece

We hope you enjoy these parts. This is still work in progress. With the addition of a couple of stock pieces, you can make a very fun, very safe* buggy!

Original concept, bits and bobs, office teas and scones,design: AngusMcBeth

3D modelling and fixing AngusMcBeths models,design: Electronicfox

Wheel and suspension setup, design: Zitronen

Development thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34014-WIP-Rover-RollKage

Please do not redistribute without prior consent.

*no warranty implied

This parts pack makes me sad......sad there is no mud-holes on Kerbin!

Awesome little parts pack, great job bud!
Now I don't need to fear having my kerbal ejected then run over (Again)
It was great fun to work with angus and electronicfox!

It was great fun to work with angus and electronicfox!

And there is still more to come...

I will add a list of planned additions asap. Electronicfox and Zitronen are halfway through working on a new set of wheels, and I will be making some basic parts, learning some more stuff about unity and losing my temper at blender. We do not expect to update for a couple of weeks and will probably only add a few parts here and there until we see how people use this pack.

Thanks

Angus

Edit:Wheels finished, adding tomorrow.

The rollcages go very well with Electronicfox's caterpillar tracks.

The rollcages go very well with Electronicfox's caterpillar tracks.

Electronicfox may yet make a custom set for RollKage. Hes obsessed with wheels for now
This is awesome! Thank you
A Must Have, if you ask me!

Just down loaded and tried. NICE.

Couple of comments:

While I was able to attach two seat one in front of the other, there is not a "pretty" way to add more than one seat. I would suggest making a additional part either wider or longer. Two to four Kerbal capacity would be nice. Is this what you me by a truck part?

There is no place to attach a probe core, orientated with the direction of the cage. Suggestion add a node at the back of the cage.

There is sizable jump on loading. I just tested on Kerbin, but it might be a problem on a low gravity world. Maybe having the shocks start extended? Would help with placement in the VAB/SPH too. This might be a limitation of the game I don't know.

Very Nice Mod, hope you continue development. By the way my test vehicle was .62 tons. Contained 2 extenders with wheels mounted, roll cage, short girder with 400 battery and probe core mounted "inside", and a two rtg on the side. During the test crash only the seat went flying. Considering the violence of the collision that is impressive.

A wider version of the rollkage to accomodate more kerbals is placced.

For the wheels, they mus start in ther compressed state, this is a limitation of the game (I#d assume to prevent wheels clipping with the ground on loading).

For the first update, sometimes you just need a little more wheel.
